summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 31341, entitled: "An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of Orcas Street, from 32nd Avenue South to 37th Avenue South produced; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor, and providing that the cost of said improvement shall be paid by special assessment upon the property specially benefited in the manner provided by law", approved May 20, 1913 and published May 27, 1913; and authorizing the dismissal of the action in the Superior Court based upon said ordinance, and the payment of all taxable costs.
